```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gcookbook)
library(gridExtra)
library(ggrepel)
library(grid)
source("./util.R")

sysname <- Sys.info()['sysname']
jpfont <- if_else(sysname == 'Darwin', "HiraKakuProN-W3", if_else(sysname == "Linux", "IPAMincho", "IPAMincho"))
```

```{r}
# Linux
font_A <- c("IPAMincho")
font_A <- c("HiraKakuProN-W3")
d <- data.frame(X=rep(1:5, 2), Y=c(1:5, 5:1), A=rep(c('い','いい'), each=5))

ggplot(data=d, aes(x=X, y=Y, group=A, color=A)) +
  geom_line(size=2) +
  labs(x="えっくす", y="わい", color="えー", title="たいとる") + 
  theme(text = element_text(family = font_A))
```
